message: Let's split fairly, I take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal before inflation hurts us both.
Come on, Bob, I'm being reasonable here
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats up more of our potential gains.
You're getting closer, Bob, but I still want a bit more
Alice, this is it. A 50/50 split is the only fair deal at this point.  Take it before inflation hurts us both even more.
